item.title: [ 31] /180/ 2026 Paddy Power World Darts Championship Day 6
item.description:
The 2025/26 Paddy Power World Darts Championship continues at London‚Äôs Alexandra Palace on Tuesday with the tournament's fifth double session of action.

Day Six of the World Darts Championship sees 2021 Champion Gerwyn Price begins his title challenge against Adam Gawlas in the evening, with world number six Danny Noppert facing Jurjen van der Velde. Last year‚Äôs semi-finalist Chris Dobey is the headline act in the afternoon session as he faces China's Xiaochen Zong.

>Today‚Äôs matches (12:30pm start)
Alan Soutar v Teemu Harju
Nick Kenny v Justin Hood
Scott Williams v Paolo Nebrida
(8) Chris Dobey v Xiaochen Zong

>Tonight's matches (7:00pm start)
Ricardo Pietreczko v Jose de Sousa
(6) Danny Noppert v Jurjen van der Velde
(9) Gerwyn Price v Adam Gawlas
Niko Springer v Joe Comito

>Day 5 roundup

item.title: [ 31] EU bros, get your crypto off exchanges before Jan 1st 2026
item.description:
The eighth version of the European Directive on Administrative Cooperation (DAC8) will come into force next year. It requires crypto service providers and intermediaries to store and disclose their customers' data. Tax authorities in European Union countries will then exchange this data with each other.

This procedure will be carried out in conjunction with the Crypto-Asset Reporting Framework (CARF), which will be implemented by the OECD from January 1, 2027. This framework will enable data to be exchanged with countries outside the EU, except for the United States, with which data exchanges will only begin in 2029.

Clearly, these exchanges will give tax authorities a better overview of your crypto assets and facilitate the control and fight against tax evasion and fraud.

Thanks to DAC8, the Federal Public Service will therefore have access to your identification data (name, address, national registration number), information about your transactions (from crypto to crypto or to fiat currency), your types of cryptocurrencies, the number of units you own, their gross amounts, transfers to external accounts, data on your balances, etc.

Original filename: IMG_3974.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [113] /mug/ - Manchester United General
item.description:
So, it happened AGAIN. We can blame Lammons, we can blame injuries, we can praise the refs for keeping us in this match, we can praise Jason Bournemouth's effort, but the truth is it's simply not enough. Tactics, determination you name it, it all stinks.

Don't get me wrong, I still have full faith in Amorim and the lads, but MASSIVE reinforcements are desperately needed in the winter. Otherwise I'm not very optimistic about the second half of the season. Not playing like this. What do you think, /mug/? #AMORIN or #AMOROUT?

>Some helpful links to numb the pain:
https://twitter.com/GNev2
https://jlingz.com
https://www.manutd.com/en/fans/iloveunited-india

item.title: [ 65] >AI companies (who do not make a profit) require insane amounts of resources li
item.description:
>AI companies (who do not make a profit) require insane amounts of resources like ram/vram
>hardware companies know this and are deciding to sell ram directly to them for more profit than consumers, causing scarcity
>said scarcity is so bad that its affecting the ability of companies who need these things to create the same electronics that would use AI
am i missing something? who exactly is supposed to use (commercial) AI and give them money if everyone is priced out of any electronic device that can actually use it?

Original filename: file.png
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 56] US President blames Rob Reiner's death by homicide on "incurable case of Trump Derangement Syndrome"
item.description:
https://www.standard.co.uk/news/world/rob-reiner-murdertrump-derangement-syndrome-b1262675.html
Donald Trump appeared to suggest that the fatal stabbing of Rob Reiner and his wife, Michele, was due to ‚ÄúTrump Derangement Syndrome‚Äù.

In a post on Truth Social, the US President said that the ‚Äúonce very talented movie director and comedy star,‚Äù had died ‚Äúreportedly due to the anger he caused others through his massive, unyielding, and incurable affliction with a mind crippling disease‚Äù called TDS - or Trump Derangement Syndrome.

TDS is said to refer to a feeling of disdain for the president, which Trump supporters in the US have used to describe negative reactions to the president that are characterized as irrational and disconnected from Trump's actual policy positions

In his post the president went on: ‚ÄúHe was known to have driven people CRAZY by his raging obsession with President Donald J. Trump, with his obvious paranoia reaching new heights as the Trump Administration surpassed all goals and expectations of greatness‚Äù

This is not the first time that the president has taken aim at a public figure after their death ‚Äì with Trump also mocking the late John McCain and General Colin Powell after their deaths.

Reiner, a 78-year-old celebrated director and actor, was outspoken in his support of liberal causes and the Democratic Party.

He even went as far as minimising concerns about Joe Biden‚Äôs age, saying ‚ÄúLook, he's old!‚Äù in an interview in February 2024 before Biden dropped out.

He told Variety in 2017, ‚ÄúDonald Trump is the single most unqualified human being to ever assume the presidency of the United States‚Äù.

Reiner is known for celebrated movie classics including Stand By Me, The Princess Bride, Few Good Men, and When Harry Met Sally.

The couple's 32-year-old son, Nick, is currently in custody after being arrested for murder after the couple were found stabbed to death.

Original filename: 1737952799289005.png
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 56] Brown University shooting leaves 2 dead, 9 injured as police search for killer
item.description:
https://www.reuters.com/world/us/multiple-people-shot-brown-university-official-says-2025-12-13/
Dec 13 (Reuters) - More than 400 law enforcement personnel were deployed on Saturday as police sought the suspect in a shooting at Brown University in Rhode Island that left two students dead and another nine people wounded at the Ivy League school, officials said.
The Providence university remained in lockdown hours after a suspect with a firearm entered a building where students were taking exams. Officials do not believe there is any "specific, ongoing threat" from the suspect, Providence Mayor Brett Smiley said late Saturday, but with law enforcement agencies canvassing the area and conducting a manhunt, a shelter-in-place order for the campus and the surrounding neighborhood will remain for now.

The shelter-in-place allows (law enforcement) to do their work in the first phase of the investigation," Smiley said.
Streets around the campus were packed with emergency vehicles and security was heightened around the city as law enforcement agencies sought the gunman, who has not yet been identified, officials said. Agents from the Federal Bureau of Investigation and the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives are working with local and state police on the investigation.
Officials released a video of the suspect, a male possibly in his 30s and dressed in black. Providence Deputy Police Chief Timothy O‚ÄôHara said the individual may have worn a mask, but officials are not certain.
Investigators retrieved shell casings from the scene of the shooting, but police are not prepared to release details yet, O'Hara said.
The gunman escaped after shooting students in a classroom in Brown's Barus & Holley engineering building, where outer doors had been unlocked while exams were taking place, officials said. Detectives are looking into why that location was targeted, police Chief Oscar Perez told reporters at a news conference.

Original filename: AFIWMZVAQ5JC7AGZZRTJR7JUMA.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [269] Gunmen kill at least 11 people during a Jewish event on Sydney‚Äôs Bondi Beach
item.description:
https://apnews.com/article/australia-shooting-sydney-bondi-beach-31f711f09f677d0f88091ece25f651c1
SYDNEY (AP) ‚Äî Two gunmen shot dead at least 11 people on Sunday at a Jewish event being held at Sydney‚Äôs Bondi Beach, Australian authorities said, declaring it a terrorist attack. One gunman was fatally shot by police and the second arrested.

The suspect was in critical condition, authorities said. At least 29 people were confirmed wounded, including two police officers, said Mal Lanyon, the police commissioner for New South Wales state, where Sydney is located.

‚ÄúThis attack was designed to target Sydney‚Äôs Jewish community,‚Äù the state‚Äôs Premier Chris Minns said. The massacre was declared a terrorist attack due to the event targeted and weapons used, Lanyon said.

Hundreds had gathered for an event at Bondi Beach called Chanukah by the Sea, which was celebrating the start of the Hanukkah Jewish festival.

Dramatic footage apparently filmed by a member of the public and broadcast on Australian television channels showed someone appearing to tackle and disarm one of the gunmen, before pointing the man‚Äôs weapon at him.

Lanyon said the death toll was ‚Äúfluid‚Äù and that wounded people were still arriving at hospitals.

Lachlan Moran, 32, from Melbourne, was waiting for his family nearby when he heard shots, he told The Associated Press. He dropped the beer he was carrying for his brother and ran.

‚ÄúYou heard a few pops, and I freaked out and ran away. ... I started sprinting. I just had that intuition. I sprinted as quickly as I could,‚Äù Moran said. He said he heard shooting off and on for about five minutes.

‚ÄúEveryone just dropped all their possessions and everything and were running and people were crying and it was just horrible,‚Äù Moran said.

item.title: [183] So what is the verdict on the DLC? Pros: > Some likeable and innovative meg
item.description:
So what is the verdict on the DLC?

Pros:
> Some likeable and innovative mega designs like Megal Absol Z, Chimecho, Golurk and so on.
>The only mainline game where you can catch more than 10 elusive myticals.
> The story is fine, the way Darkrai appeared himself before mega is absolute cinema.
> Fan favorite Corbeau played an important role in the story as yumebait

Cons:
> Too grindy, grinding berries and points are exhausting and meaningless.
> Poorly implemented timer mechanic in HS where bascially every HS is rushed through while doing chores
> Another grievance is how the donut system works, which is basically haphazard.

Discuss.

Original filename: G0pqRl8XsAEah9e.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 35] RASH DECISION, ESCAPE TO SEA
item.description:
I am fed up with my life in the US and am planning to leave to SEA ASAP. I cannot afford college anymore at 22yo, and instead of disparing, and becoming a full wage slave for the long run, I have a loose plan:
1. I have obtained my TEFL for English tutoring, I plan to utilize this to hopefully sustain some income supplementarily.
2. I plan to start a Bald and Bankrupt style travel channel with a series called "JeetMax", and I am not trolling. You see Jeet in Hindi means victory, as I learned on /pol/ recently, and I as an American would like to make a series showing what it is like going from Punjab India, to Melbourne Australia as an aspiring software engineer. Perhaps giving some empathy, and also showing the harsh reality of one of the Sikh 'invaders', giving some humanity, but also showing the dark sides of the subject matter.
3. I was thinking DaNang Viet. as a base of operations, a cheap and decent place to keep my things in the beginning of the series.
4. Whilst I am in the US I am applying for the Australia Work Holiday Visa, that will be my more long term settlement goal, and of course a key step in the series.
5. I am selling my car, and many of my things, I will have a meager ‚âà12,000 USD to my name. Certainly not much august in relation to finances, but I don't have options or time.

To you folks of the traveling variety, what information can you give me? Preferably other than the "you are retarded, stay and work in the USA". Indeed, this must work, or it will be the end of my story so it seems. Any information would be appreciated.

-Cheers!

Original filename: 1000029789.jpg

item.title: [227] /tpg/ - ThinkPad General
item.description:
>>107462755
Don't buy anything OTHER THAN IBM/Lenovo ThinkPad T, X, and W/P Series if you want the Real Business Experience‚Ñ¢
>Other business laptops are welcome in /tpg/ (Dell Latitude/Precision, HP EliteBook/ZBook)

Why ThinkPad?
>Used machines are plentiful and cheap
>Excellent keyboards, tactile feel and quiet + the TrackPoint
>Great durability: magnesium roll cage for structural integrity, with high quality plastic body panels
>Utilitarian design: e.g. indicator LEDs, 7 row keyboard layout on older models
>Docking stations that easily turns your laptop into a desktop
>Easy to repair (most models), upgrade & maintain thanks to readily available service manuals for every model, spare parts easy & cheap to obtain
>Excellent Linux & *BSD support

ThinkWiki - General info about ThinkPads/specs
https://www.thinkwiki.org/wiki/ThinkWiki

Model generations:
>Classic IBM: T40, T41, T42
>IBM/Lenovo Transition: T43, T60, T61 (T42 - T43: significant difference in specs)
>"Classic" Lenovo: T400, T410, T420 (T61 - T400: 4:3 to 16:10)
>Transition to old modern: T430, T440, T450 (T420 - T430: membrane to chiclet)
>Old modern: T460, T470, T480 (T450 - T460: significantly less thick)
>New modern: T490, T14g1, T14g2 (T480 - T490: design change)
>New new modern: T14g3, T14g4, ... (T14g2 - T14g3: second design change)

BIOS replacement:
https://coreboot.org/downloads.html
https://libreboot.org/docs/install/
https://canoeboot.org/docs/install/

Additional resources:
https://dankpads.com/tpg/
https://biosimage.booru.org
https://1vyra.in

Patches:
https://github.com/digmorepaka/thinkpad-firmware-patches
https://github.com/hamishcoleman/thinkpad-ec

Chat:
##ibmthinkpad on libera
#/tpg/ on rizon

item.title: [298] what strange / spooky stuff have you seen? once when i was in the desert, th
item.description:
what strange / spooky stuff have you seen?

once when i was in the desert, there was a telephone pole, on it looked exactly like a 10ft tall bird of prey, just eyeing me down
it was about a good 5min of walking, which felt like forever, just to see that it was a transformer that looked weird, none of the other poles had it either
sounds dumb, but it really did look exactly like a gigantic human sized hawk, and the "head" even seemed to follow you too, really interesting illusion, since it also hit all the primal parts of the brain that gone "you're about to be fucking eaten by a bird!!!!!!"
a year or two later, when i was gonna take a picture, it was gone, which adds a strange air to "it was right there, i tell you!"

>inb4 go to /x/ for this shit
i want real stories, not >i smelled the rotten shit fart gas, and my best friend was turned into a skinwalker, and then i pulled out that gun from videogame and blasted it, dude trust me

Original filename: pngtree-the-light-shining-through-a-tunnel-of-tree.gif
item.author: Anonymous
